data.title: Thai cave rescue boys sign Netflix deal for miniseries
data.desc: (CNN)The twelve Thai boys and their soccer coach who were trapped in a flooded cave last summer will soon tell their story on Netflix. On Tuesday, they formally signed a deal with the online streaming giant.

data.title: 'Game of Thrones' ending comes with HBO at a crossroads Brian Lowry byline
data.desc: When 'The Sopranos' went black in 2007, there was speculation that HBO might never generate another hit of that magnitude.

data.title: A real life Schitt's Creek: What it's like to own a whole town
data.desc: Rick Hofstetter has been married and divorced three times, but he has one love that has outlasted them all: Story, Indiana.

data.title: Burger King plans to roll out Impossible Whopper across the United States
data.desc: Burger King's test of a vegetarian version of its signature Whopper was such a success, the chain is planning to roll the Impossible Whopper out nationally this year.
